title: Servers are dead
body: Where is the loss forgiven, i just played a game where everyone literally dc'd every minute for the whole game

replies.body: did u have this guy in ur game ? ID:  Dirty Debbie

DOCTOR GET IN HERE STAT, THE SERVERS ARE DYING ON US! *hospital noises* GET ME THE DEFILRILATORS KATHY! OH GOD HE'S DYING DOCTOR! *Kathy faints from the shock* It's too late, we lost 'em. Estimated time of death, 0600 hours. We lost a good man today... 

{{champion:39}}
Same happened to me just then, luckily my team won :/
Nope, it's everyone. 8 people in my game just dced
